member.name: T:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.Telemetry.AppInsightsProvider
member.summary: Allows to log telemetry events via AppInsights.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.Telemetry.TestingPlatformBuilderHook
member.summary: This class is used by Microsoft.Testing.Platform.MSBuild to hook into the Testing Platform Builder to add AppInsights support.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.Telemetry.TestingPlatformBuilderHook.AddExtensions(Microsoft.Testing.Platform.Builder.ITestApplicationBuilder,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds AppInsights support to the Testing Platform Builder.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.Telemetry.Resources.ExtensionResources.AddAppInsightsTelemetryProviderInvalidBuilder
member.summary: AppInsights telemetry provider can only be registered onto Microsoft.Testing.Platform.Builder.TestApplicationBuilder builders

member.name: T:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.AppInsightsTelemetryProviderExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for adding AppInsights telemetry provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Testing.Extensions.AppInsightsTelemetryProviderExtensions.AddAppInsightsTelemetryProvider(Microsoft.Testing.Platform.Builder.ITestApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the AppInsights telemetry provider to the test application.
